title: Engagerly
description: Engagerly Bot is a powerful Discord bot that boosts your community's engagement and growth. ◾ BENEFITS: ❶Boost member engagement ❷Reward valuable members ❸Accelerate community growth ◾ FEATURES: ❶Points-based economy ❷Gamified tasks system (daily rewards, role rewards, invite rewards, message count, response count, specific message reactions, twitter engagement, twitter follow, twitter posting) ❸Rewards ecosystem (Points Shop, Giveaways) ❹Leaderboards, and more.
